person.persName: James Bradley (Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Floyd County, Kentucky, native. Married to Elizabeth Howard Bradley. Father of George Bradley, William Bradley, Elizabeth Bradley, Artha Bradley, Preston Bradley, Farleny Bradley, James B. Bradley, and Ceatty Bradley. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Breathitt County in 1864.
